website_summaries.verdict: With more personality than most, these knitted slippers are a fantastic choice for those looking for something a little different.
pros: Layers of high density memory foam and shock absorbing EVA foam provide maximum comfort, while minor arch support helps combat foot pain
Non-slip sole conveniently allows for outdoor use, and the sweater-like knit will keep toes toasty
Youthful design is unique and attractive
cons: Funky knit pattern might not be everyone's cup of tea

customer_reviews.title: While the shoes are super comfy (lots of plush
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for serious comfort. 2 stars subtracted for some severe sizing issues. While the shoes are super comfy (lots of plush!), the sizing is way off. I read other reviews saying the same, and figured that the 9-10 would fit my foot with maybe half a size to spare. I’m a size 8.5. Instead my foot just fits it. From toe to heel. Making it a sightly tight fit. My child with a size 9 foots heel hangs off the back when she tried it on.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy slippers!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got these slippers I tried them on and they fit perfectly! I usually wear either a size 8 or 8.5 but I ordered these slippers in 9/10 since I read some other reviews saying they run a little smaller. Overall, I am satisfied with them so far...cute, comfy and warm 😊
customer_reviews.author: emc1824

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife. She liked the style and fit. She didn't wear them outdoors. She is a stay at home mom and wore them on average of 3 to 4 hours a day around the house. Purchased in March of 2019 and disposed of in garbage September 2019. One slipper has no issues, the other not so much. Looks like the stitching didn't hold where the fabric met the rubber.
customer_reviews.author: J Funk

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I may be leaving this review a tad early but can always change as I wear them and notice problems. I am a size 7 women’s and these fit perfectly from toe to heel. Loose in the width. Just what I was looking for. I’m a fairly new owner of an all ceramic tile floor (5 years). Lately I have had feet aches, especially my heels. Everyone keeps telling me my barefoot days are over and I should always wear slippers. There is definitely nice padding in these slippers, I Feel the padding in the arches as well. My hopes are that they don’t go flat after just a few weeks. Will follow up in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: comfy slippers
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfy slippers. I wear two different size shoes, left foot is an 11, and right foot is a 10. I bought the 11-12 size, just to be sure since several reviews mentioned these ran a little small. The fit is great. The right slipper is a little long, but not too bad. Since these have no back, it's not a big issue. They are warm and have a slight arch support built in. Great for wearing around the house.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Returned first pair and got next size up. They are just ok, had to put insole in to be comfortable to wear. Without insert they make my feet hurt. Next pair started to come apart after 3 days
customer_reviews.author: cheryl kenney

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and soft in person. They are exactly as pictured and will make a great Christmas gift. The colors are nice and vibrant and the knit material is very soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Farrell

customer_reviews.title: No support as suggested in product description
customer_reviews.text: They work fine for short periods of time when cold in the morning. The padding feels okay when first worn, but wears down very quickly. Their claim to have an arch support or to help with common foot pain such as plantar fasciitis or diabetic foot pain is false, as I suffer from both.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small, but are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women’s 9.5, so I ordered the 9/10, but I barely fit lengthwise. Widthwise they are bigger then normal. Other then that, these are very comfortable and warm. The rubber soles are thick enough to be worn outside, but I strictly wear mine inside.
customer_reviews.author: S. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: True to Size for Comfy Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what size to order, but these were so cute I had to try. Thanks to one of the reviewers, I went with my typical size. I'm a solid 8 so I bought the 7-8. Perfect fit! The style is very cute. I love the periwinkle! It's the beginning of summer, and I usually wear these around the house. They do get warm at times, but I tend to run cold. I've had some foot pain over the past few weeks, and these are a great alternative to wearing sneakers around the house. I feel like I have good support, and the foam is still cushy. I will definitely be ordering more from RockDove!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love! Cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Just got them today so not sure how they stand up to wear. Really soft on the inside and will be great come winter. Hard bottom so you can use them for running to take out the trash or something. I’m a 7-7.5 shoe size so I got the 7-8 range and these fit like a glove. I think if you’re a true 8 then you might want to go the next size up as my foot is right to the edge of the back of the shoe. I think a true 8 wearer would be stepping on the back trim.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Well-Made for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are comfortable and well-made for the price. I had high expectations, looking for something with a lot of support to replace a more expensive pair I bought about a year ago. The foam is cushy but I don't think they'll last more than 6 months to 1 year and there's no arch support. I also would have liked for the bottom to have a more textured/grippy sole. It has the flat sole of a tennis shoe (which can be a bit slippery if you're walking on, say, wet ceramic tile) and is not very quiet if you're walking on hard floors. Although they're not the slippers of my dreams, I appreciate that they're machine washable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: anne m robinson

customer_reviews.title: Delightful!
customer_reviews.text: I am fussy about my feet. Buying slippers is generally an ordeal my family will not touch. When I saw these slippers on Amazon, I thought, ok cute and they look like they should be comfortable and if not back they go. Well, now that the weather is getting cooler, it is so nice to have snuggly warm cozy slippers for my feet. It definitely helps when the floors chill down. Now I wish I had gotten another pair as a spare for when these are in the laundry! Try them, these won't end up as dog toys!
customer_reviews.author: Quency256

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING! Absolutely love it. I bought it for my mom because she's always complaining that her feet hurts from the tile floors. I tried it on before I gave it to her. There's so much cushion and the sole is pretty thick too. It fits perfectly. I'm definitely buying myself a pair bc I see myself borrowing my mom's pair alot if I don't.
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Great - But order a size up
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are great! They're cute and comfortable. They have plenty of "squish" and warmth. I'm really loving them. However, they do run small. I am a size 9 or 9.5 so I originally ordered the 9-10. I had to send them back. Maybe if I was just a size smaller I could have worn them. The back of my heel just rested on the edge unless I really jammed my toes in. I re-ordered the size 11-12 and they fit great! So if you're a 9/9.5 try ordering the 11-12 for a roomier slipper. They're definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: E.E.B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: These fit better than most house slippers I have bought. The padding is fairly good, but the part on the front of the foot goes flat pretty quick and the soles are somewhat slick, but overall I like them and would reorder them.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Size 5-8 snug if wearing with socks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the slippers, which is why I gave them five stars. I am a true size 5. In the winter I usually wear a pair of socks with my slippers because it’s cold in my house. When I put the slippers on and have my socks on they are a little tight. But when I wear the slippers with no socks they fit just right. Would I purchase them again? I would purchase them again if I was planning on wearing them without socks. The size that I have is 5-8 Small. I don’t know whether or not the next size up would be too large. I hope that this review helps. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Wannabme

customer_reviews.title: Zero arch suport, no memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopefull for a sweater slipper with decent arch support these are not it. I could have purchased a 8$ pair from target with more support. They are cute and warm but they hurt my feet after wearing them for just a few minutes. There is no real memory foam and zero arch support. The graphic on the product info most certainly is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: jennmp

customer_reviews.title: Plantar Fasciitis Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from very painful plantar fasciitis/severe heel pain. Reading the reviews I thought let me give them a try. Well, I'm very disappointed. My Dearfoams that I purchased at Walgreens are way better. I'm a size 9 1/2 and I'm glad I ordered the 11-12, my heel hits the end of the slipper like my actual size would fit. They are also very very snug to the point where my foot feels like it's suffocating. I don't have a wide foot and it's not narrow either. These slippers are just a cheap China made product. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton44

customer_reviews.title: Love These Comfy Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. They are cushy on the soles of your feet, and breathably comfortable on your toes. I have quite large feet (11 WW) and was worried that they might not fit. No worries. They fit me perfectly, even though they don't have wide sizes. People who have very narrow feet may find these slippers too big, but for me...they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Cass

customer_reviews.title: Too small and misleading.
customer_reviews.text: First, I ordered a 9-10 sizes. What I received was a 7-8. Given this lockdown, I'm unable to easily return so instead I let my mom have them since she liked them anyway and honestly would have ordered her a pair if she wanted one anyway so she tries them on and for her they are fine because she stays in the house, but the pictures are misleading as they make you think this is a good sole. It is not. It's very thin and you feel everything when you walk on it. I'd honestly buy a different slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Karen/Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This ia my second pair of these slippers. They are warm and comfortable. I highly recommend them for anyone who has diabetes or arthritis, fibromyalgia, and neuropothy. These slippers help with all of these problems. The Sweater top doesn't hurt the top of your foot and the rubber bottom keeps you from slipping and falling.
customer_reviews.author: Patty61

customer_reviews.title: Cute slippers!
customer_reviews.text: These do fit on the small side. I'm a size 11 and the XL (11-12) size just fits. They are very cute and comfortable though -- perfect for puttering around the house. I appreciate that the bottoms are waterproof so if I need to step out the front door they don't get wet, but I would prefer a rubbery bottom. These bottoms are more plasticy, so I don't love the way they sound and feel against my hard floors. That's just a personal pet peeves though. All in all, I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Get them
customer_reviews.text: This product is five stars, I work on my feet all day so when I come home and put these little things on, I get relief from my plantar fasciitis. They remind me of the cute little sweaters gramma used to make. They have a water proof underside, so they are safe to take the kids out to the bus in the morning without slipping. I wear these every day. Warm comfy and they fit just right. Cushy with the memory foam. I wanna get a pair for everyone in my family
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy but they don't last forever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair I've bought. I wear them all winter long and they usually last around 1.5 years. I wear a size 8 shoe but order the Large, which is one size up, since I like roominess. I have a wide foot and they are perfect! Very cushy base too, not thin like some others. BUT here's the thing- they're 20 bucks. If you wear them every day through the Fall and Winter months like I do, eventually they're gonna wear thin on the soles. They're slippers. They're gonna wear you, you know? Don't you want new slippers every year anyway? (Yes!) Maybe ask for them for Christmas, lol.
customer_reviews.author: MamaT

customer_reviews.title: I love them and seem to be wearing them all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding slippers wide enough due to swelling in my feet and ankles--since these stretch some they have worked very well. I love them and seem to be wearing them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Davis

customer_reviews.title: No cushioning at all!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where all these reviews come from that say these slippers are so comfortable with lots of cushioning. I feel no memory foam cushioning at all. When walking on a tile floor, I can feel the hard floor almost as if I’m walking barefoot! Sure, they’re cute enough, and the knit fabric is cozy, but what good does that do if they make your feet hurt on the bottom to wear them? Guess I’ll wear them while sitting to keep my feet warm.....
customer_reviews.author: V. Pack

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: So cute, so comfy, small arch support. Very happy with my purchase. Just suggest order 1 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable memory foam, Itchy cloth, Runs short
customer_reviews.text: Pro: -Cute design and colors -Very comfortable memory foam footbed -More arch support than most slippers Con: -cloth used for footbed is itchy/uncomfortable -too short. I wear a 6.5 and a size 7-8 had my toe jammed up front and my heel pushing against the back -too wide--once the memory foam adjusted to the heat of my foot, there was way too much space on the sides and above my foot
customer_reviews.author: C. Li

customer_reviews.title: Well made and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a women's size 7.5 but I knew from experience with other slippers the 7-8 would be too short so I ordered the 9-10 and they are somewhat large. Since it is almost 100 degrees today I won't be wearing them for awhile but when I do I will wear them with a pair of socks and they will fit just right. Wish they made a 8-9. Slippers are well constructed and I love the arch support and memory foam. Plus they are cute.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and keep my feet warm. They are also easy to slip on and off once they formed to the shape of my feet. The cushioning is just right and not overbearing like some others I've tried. I bought these because the material won't catch and hold onto anything and everything if I decide to walk outside in them. I'm a size 9w and I ordered a Large 9 - 10, my feet fit perfectly in them.
customer_reviews.author: HazelWolf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write unflattering reviews but these slippers were a disappointment. They are wide and sloppy fitting over the instep so they feel like they might slip off, although my feet are wide. Also, the soles are plastic and although there is a grooved pattern on the sole, the plastic itself has no grip to it and feel slippery on the floor. I really wish they had been what I needed and I will not return them since I wore them for a few days to give them a fair chance. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flora

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm slippers!
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are soft, warm, comfrontable, look nice, and have some arch support. They also have a non-slip sole and should be fine for wearing outside, although I haven't tried that yet. If needed, I can wear socks with them. I find that with the memory foam, it makes them a little too flexible for my feet. I decided to keep them and see if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: older wiser

customer_reviews.title: Sizes seem random - but very comfy
customer_reviews.text: My 1st pair of slippers was size large and they were quite large, I could only wear them with socks on or they would fall off. I wore them out because they are so very comfy so I decided to order a new pair, but stayed with sizr large because too large is better than too small. BUT....they fit perfect! I don't know, lol they both say they are size large, but my first pair are larger.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The only slippers you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest slippers I've ever owned! I can't get over how cute they are - like wearing little sweaters on your feet! They're so comfortable and warm, a must-have for a cold winter day. I usually wear 6.5-7, so I'm glad I read the reviews that said they run slightly small, and opted for the 7-8 size, because they fit perfectly! Everyone needs these sweater slippers in their lives. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, run a little small
customer_reviews.text: These slippers keep my feet way warmer than any others I’ve ever had. There’s also surprisingly good support. The blue color is pretty and true to the pictures. Nice quality. They do run small. I almost always wear a 9, occasionally a 9.5. I ordered these in a 9-10 and they are a tad small on me (and I’m at the bottom end of the size range!).
customer_reviews.author: goodness

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Day gift.  She loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Mother's Day gift. My mom is a size 8 but I got 9-10. As it turns out, the 9-10 size fits her perfectly. She absolutely loves them. She had a problem with her pinky toe that makes wearing certain shoes, or walking around barefoot, uncomfortable for her. She says these are super comfortable and make it easy on that foot to walk around. Update: She loved these while they lasted, but they fell apart. Big holes developed on the inside soles. Cheap material I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Comfy slippers but description stated that they would fit an 11/12 and I barely fit into them & I'm a true size 11 in everything. My heel goes right to the back edge. Not a lot of toe room but I'm hoping they will stretch a little the more I wear them. Definitely a better option than a $100 pair of Uggs to wear around the house!
customer_reviews.author: jhinch

customer_reviews.title: True to size and sooo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of house shoes like this. My first pair lasted about a year of extreme indoor/outdoor use until they stretched out and wouldnt stay on my feet when I walked. So I purchased a 2nd pair and they're still just as comfy! Love them. I wear a size 8.5 in women's shoes but I ordered the size 7-8 in these and it's a perfect, snug fit. Will probably buy again when I've worn these out. Update: I've now purchased my 3rd pair of these and will keep coming back when I've warn them out. They're my go-to house shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Harless

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are very cute and comfortable. When first tried on they felt snug but after breaking them in they are a perfect fit and the memory foam is fantastic. They also don't make my feet too hot if wearing socks with the slippers. Hard bottom is great for when you need to run outside quickly and don't want to put on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Q.

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new slippers. These are really great. Love the color . As for the fit they do require some break in time. But I expected that going in. They are so soft and plushie all the way around your foot. The foot bed is incredibly soft but supportive. Nice out sole for wearing outside. Very glad I purchased these. Great price point too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly  Conner

customer_reviews.title: Good slippers but hotter than you’d think
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam has flattened pretty substantially within the first day or two of wear, although the nice soft plastic or rubber sole has helped quite a bit from complete pancaking. This does have the effect of less air flow than you might think, given the loose knitting of the top of the slip. This is definitely of a better quality than the cheapo slippers on Amazon, but you’ll need to look elsewhere for more arch support or airflow. Doggos will immediate wish to eat them and will be a primary target, but it patches up really well with a knowledgeable sewing hand. Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered another pair of RockDoves in 9-10, but they were too large. I normally wear size 8.5 so I sized up as suggested. But my feet are kind of short and wide (I can also wear 7.5W shoes) and the size 9-10 were about an inch too long and also too wide. Okay in the house but uncomfortable to wear outside. So I decided to try these in the 7-8 size and they are absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: EffieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wife Likes Hers!
customer_reviews.text: Wife has worn them every day for the last three weeks as her go-to indoors house shoes and she loves them. We bought them a size bigger than her normal shoe size based on other Amazon reviews and that was a smart move, they fit perfectly. Wife says they keep her feet warm and were comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cute and love the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear on my hardwood floors now that it is getting to be colder weather. It is true what other reviewer‘s have said about the slippers running small. I wear a size 8 - 8 1/2, so I ordered a size 9-10 and they fit perfectly as long is I am barefoot. They feel a little too snug with socks. I love the pink design. It looks like a little sweater for my feet. They provide enough arch support and I am happy with them overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to buy comfortable slippers, that fit, on line. I wear a 7 1/2-8 so I bought medium size 7/8 and these slippers fit just right! After wearing them for a few weeks and have broken them in, I wear them every day because I work from home, they still fit very well! Very comfortable and warm. I got the blue pair and they are beautiful. I will be sticking with this brand for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Regina D

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple ones in 2017? And they lasted very well for me, I am very hard on my slippers in the autumn/winter/spring months. They lasted me over a year. So I bought the pink ones this time around, they’re very pretty and comfy. I wear 8.5, and got the 7/8, they mold to the shape of my feet, and that extra .5 isn’t a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sean and Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute, the size is as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, the size is as expected, and I really like the product! I normally wear size 8.5-9 (B) and I ordered the size 9-10 (B/M), and these are just the right size- slightly snug, but I know that it will stretch a bit with time. If you have wider feet- I would recommend going up a size. Also, they are quite warm so if you're thinking about using these all the time (and you live in a hot climate) you may want to reserve these for colder months. Overall I would recommend these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: MCherie

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6.5 - 7 and I got the 7-8 and it fits perfectly with about a 1cm space behind my heel at the back of the shoe.. this allows for added comfort and not having your foot jammed right up to the top of the shoe. It is truly comfortable and keeps your feet warm. I haven't done any cooking in them as yet when I do I will update the review on arch support and long standing support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy slipper
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Christmas from my husband. They are a beautiful sweater knit pattern with a solid non-skid sole, so I can step outdoors if I need to. They felt a bit snug when first trying them, but quickly molded to my feet and fit like a glove. Toes are toasty, but they are simple to slip on and off when needed. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: H&MS

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Order a size up! I ordered these back in October now February and they have been fabulous! I did order a size up due to reviews. My experience with any slippers I always size up. I usually wear a 10 regular, ordered 11’s and fit perfect. They are comfortable and have held up very well being worn everyday around the house. Arch support still going strong. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Pinksugr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but somewhat large slippers!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice pairs of slippers, but as I was a bit afraid, they are a bit large, I wear an 8 size shoe, but when I tried for the first time, I could see, the extra space behind my heels. They are cushy enough, but I'm afraid it will go down eventually. But they are so darn cute, that I kept them! If only they would make more with a folksy design or nordic like. I bought a cotton robe(see my review) and the color blue match my slippers super. So, in spite of a few things, I love them a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Mirabelle

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT. If you're a half-size (7.5, 8.5, etc.), order the next size up.
customer_reviews.text: SO COMFY! Oh my gosh, these are so soft. I just got them today--I'll post an updated/edited review later if thing change--but I love these! They look great and feel amazing. I wear a shoe size 8 or 8.5 (depends on the brand), but I ordered the size 9-10 for these slippers and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Imogen Summers

customer_reviews.title: Love the Print
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Love the designs Super comfy True to Size Cons: Fuzzy strands sticking out Overall: Although it is a bit worn after only a month, It is still not as bad as other slippers. I've seen some that look like they've gone through a Amazonian jungle and endured all kinds of natural disasters. These slippers are worth the price in my opinion. Lovely design, comfy and somewhat durable.
customer_reviews.author: Yuyu

customer_reviews.title: Good quality scuffs
customer_reviews.text: These are a good quality. At first, they seemed a little tight, but after wearing them around for about an hour they conformed to my foot. I can wear them outside as well, as long as it's fairly dry. I haven't tried washing them, and don't know that I will. I'll probably just spot clean.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: lasts Less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these slippers! They are cozy without being too warm, and the soles are great if you need to step outside on your deck, no worries about ruining them! Plus, they are adorable. The blue is perfect! *****update, I’ve had these slippers less than a month and the toe on one has completely fallen apart. To say I’m disappointed is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the quality - will update as I can
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend's mother who LIVES in house slippers and loves to knit - I haven't given the gift yet, but I believe she will love them so long as she doesn't think they're too eye-catching with the color and pattern. I've given a low rating, however, due to the fact that as soon as I opened the package, I could see several loose threads along the soles. These threads were easily trimmable and will hopefully not lead to the slippers falling apart too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I AM SO RELIEVED IN COLORADO
customer_reviews.text: 10-7-2019 My knees don't hurt anymore !! it's a blessing, these slippers feel great, give strong cushion support when i walk, take's pressure off my knees!! great investment !! glad i found @wingsloveofficial.....
customer_reviews.author: cenythia

customer_reviews.title: These slippers are the only ones I buy....
customer_reviews.text: These are warm,soft,terrific slippers, but you need to understand that they stretch out. I wear size 12 sneakers but now I order Large slippers, because Extra Large ones become floppy. These slippers can be washed and dried on low . At first they are snug,but just wear them and they loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: I ♥ to shop

customer_reviews.title: Comfy slippers
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are comfortable & Arrived quickly. I ordered a pair for myself and my mother in law because we both have hard floors. I do find they run a little big though. I wear a size 9 1/2 and ordered up but after a few wears they were big. I still wear them but I think if you order your true shoe size you will be fine after a few wears. I would recommend these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Small Size
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these slippers as the cushion, material, and look is great and exactly what I was looking for. I normally wear an 8.5 in women's shoes and I ordered a 9-10M in these and they still just barely fit. My heel rubbed up against the back lip of the slipper such that they were uncomfortable to wear. Very disappointing. I worry that sizing up to the 10-11M will just make them huge.
customer_reviews.author: S. Branch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slipper
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers so much! They are nice and soft on the inside with a thick rubber sole. They were worth every dollar I spent on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Butler

customer_reviews.title: I'm never taking them off
customer_reviews.text: Based only on the picture (fair isle knitted pattern) I put these in my cart in the middle of the night with the plan to investigate them the next day. (I no longer order things in the middle of the night - that's how one ends up with a telescope...) Before I could take a closer look, my husband ordered everything in the cart. The slippers just arrived and they are wonderful! Soft and cushy for my feet. Enough coverage on the top to keep them from flying off, so I can walk normally and not shuffle like an old lady. No offense to old ladies, I'm just too young to shuffle. Buy them. I don't think you'll be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These slippers took a bit to get used to. Because of the foam, they run narrow. I wish there was a wide option. The toe box is small, too, and I need more room. They look cute, though. I like the Fair Isle knitting pattern. And they keep my feet relatively warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable great price
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and you cant beat the price. After a wear or two they did stretch a little which was fine and very comfortable. I did buy a size up, i wear an 8.5 and i got the 9-10 based off the other review and that worked. They are warm and comfortable i will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Josce

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the reviews about getting the next size because the slippers run small. Usually wear 7 1/2 to 8 so ordered the 9/10. Very large. Had about an inch and a half in the back of the shoe. Slippers seem nice quality and support was good, just too big. Should of ordered the correct size!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dzumba

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam and back lip doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty okay as far as slippers go. I wear 8-8 1/2 size shoes so I got the 9-10 and it fit well. I will have to be getting rid of them after 6 months as the fabric where the foot rests has torn-- that could completely be my fault for not washing them enough, however. That being said I got them for achy feet, unfortunately the memory foam has become far too compressed to offer the support it once used to, and plus the back lip has nearly completely fallen, resulting in me accidentally losing a shoe more than not. They held up okay for pretty frequent use and for the relatively low price.
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep you warm,  runs large,  true to size
customer_reviews.text: Slippers are warm, easy to get in and out of, and are able to keep a consistent shape when walking. They are comfortable to walk in. We liked the design, the only issue is that these run large or maybe even true to size. I ordered a 9 thinking it would fit her perfect since she mentioned that slippers usually run small... not the case with these.
customer_reviews.author: Burnzy

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Slipper!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers. I wear a size 10 and was a little skeptical about ordering a size9/10...thought they may be a little small. They were not, they were PERFECT! Love the colors and they keep your feet really warm. I will be ordering another pair to have a spare. They are very comfortable. I certainly would recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: kathi

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers if you don’t need arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas and she loves them. I tried them on and they are very cushy inside, but no real support. I’m used to orthotic slippers like Vionic, so these wouldN’t work for me. But she doesn’t have foot issues and loves their soft and cozy comfort. They seem to be well made and have a durable outsole.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Many manufacturers want to operate on the cheap as here and combine two sizes. I'm a solid size nine all my adult life and these slippers just fit me so the person who wears a size 10 will find her heel over the edge. Outside of the sizing defect they are pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Stretch out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are extremely comfy with the arch support as a bonus. Unfortunately, after fewer than 24 hours, the body has stretch to the point of difficulty wearing. I wouldn't buy a size smaller, because the sole/footbed fits perfectly. Similar to the sweater it resembles....it's gonna stretch. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Pamalama

customer_reviews.title: Slippers are too wide
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are attractive, and seem well made. I wear size 8B, so thought from others’ reviews that the medium slippers might be tight, but I was OK with taking that chance. I’m surprised to find that the slippers are so wide that they won’t stay on my feet. So far, one pair of insoles hasn’t helped. They’re pretty and comfortable, but may need to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Northwoods

customer_reviews.title: Size 7/8 slippers good for shoe size 6.5 feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 6 or 6.5 women's shoes. However I bought the 7/8 slippers, and they are just perfect when wearing with warm socks or without. If I had purchased the 5-6 size for slippers, it would certainly have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: J_Sant

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in these.
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are nicely made. They fit the length of my feet. But this is where the rub comes in. These are supposed to be a woman's slippers. But they don't fit my foot as far as height is concerned. They are way too big and seemed to be made for a man who have taller feet than a woman. I tried washing them to shrink them that didn't work. So I'm stuck with them scrapping all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Feline Lover

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with these. I wear steel toes and day at work and we have concrete floors at home so I was looking for the comfiest slippers I could find. I found em! They fit perfect. I’m a 7...bought a 7/8. It’s the memory foam omg. Feels like magical little pillows surrounding my tired achy feet. I love the soles as well. Gives me a nice grip around the house. I think I found my go to slippers finally.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother. Stick to dearfoam or isotoner.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these slippers for about 24 hours. I wear a size 9 in women. These seem to be too small. The packaging does say to give the slippers a few days to stretch out. I usually wear Dearfoam or Isotoner slippers in the same size. I’m going to give it a few days, but if it doesn’t stretch will be returning. The memory foam on these slippers does not compare to dearfoam nor isotoner. It felt not cushiony immediately after first wear. Lastly, these slippers are not as warm as mentioned brands. Practically not warm at all.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great fit, sturdy, warm
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! I bought these to wear after having some growths removed from the soles of my feet and I don't know how I would have gotten along without them. The memory foam really helped cushion my sore feet and helped make walking easier. The soles of these are nice and sturdy so I've been able to wear them to work while I'm waiting to heal enough for regular shoes. These are also warm without being overly hot. I would definitely purchase these again, either for myself or a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant.
customer_reviews.text: The inner sole wore out very quickly. Every time I would slide my foot in, my toes would slide into a hole in the fabric (2-3 months of use). But the WORST part is they offer zero slip resistance. After a couple of nasty falls, I threw them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Width is too Wide!
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they are nicely made. But like most reviews say you need to go up a size. The reason I I gave a 4 star it right much too wide. Worried I could trip on them since they have come of my foot while walking. If they could fix the sizing and width issue they would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers were exactly what I wanted. When I first put them on, I thought they might be a little small (I'm a sz 8 & I bought sz 7-8) but after a day or two, they fit perfectly with or without socks & are super comfy too. Love the colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Diana V

customer_reviews.title: A bit wide!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, my feet are so tired at end of day. These shoes are very cute, but very wide! Even with socks, there is too much room on the sides. I wear 8.5 in regular shoes, I read reviews and sized up to the 9-10. Length is perfect but I’m just swimming from the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, maybe this pair the little lip on back won't end up flat. Had this happen on every pair of shoes or slippers I've worn. Do like the patter, hope it won't pull too much. Like the soles, good to run down to my car across gravel drive.
customer_reviews.author: MG Gardener

customer_reviews.title: if you have texture issues, might not be for you
customer_reviews.text: my hands and feet are super sensitive, and I sometimes get feelings that I call "newspaper hands". These give me that feeling unless I wear them with socks which is probs better anyways, but the micro-fiber thing turned me off a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great for slipping on and off as my feet get hot and cold. They are a cute pattern that looks like a sweater for my feet. I like being able to retrieve the mail and take out the trash while wearing them. Win win all around.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. I am normally an 8.5 so I sized up to the 9-10. They are a little loose (as expected). When walking down stairs, I have to scrunch my toes so they don’t slip off. But any other time I wear them they fit perfect. I’d rather have them a little roomy than tight because I wear steel toe boots all day and like the movement to stretch out. Super comfortable. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Asdfghjkl

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: These have great support , highly recommend if u suffer from plantar fasciitis like I do. After wearing these for over a month, I tried my old slippers that I bought from Walmart (dearfoams) and i could instantly feel that they do not offer the same amount of cushion as these slippers do. I also have already washed them once and they still feel and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Slippers
customer_reviews.text: These are the best slippers I have ever owned. I just slip them on and they have a little piece in the back to hold them on. Since the back is not big, I can easily slip them on and off, as opposed to boot slippers where I have to pull them on and off. They are very comfortable and I will be wearing these all of the time !!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Greenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Soles have no grip
customer_reviews.text: Soft, warm, and pretty. Only flaw is that the soles do not grip well and slide on hardwood. I am very cautious on the stairs as it seems very likely I will slip. Good for sitting at my desk or shuffling around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: These run extremely small!
customer_reviews.text: These run extremely small.... I wear a size 9, ordered the large 9-10... Literally walking on the back rim making them to uncomfortable to wear. Otherwise I might have liked them thus the reason for giving them an extra star.
customer_reviews.author: Evey Sauntering

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my ex wife tried so many slippers we found on Amazon, this one by far lasted the longest and of course, very comfortable. You can find cuter slippers but i dont think you can beat the quality and comfort of these at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Ramadan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and last!
customer_reviews.text: Rockdove is the best in hpuseshoes. I've worn them for several years now and only have to buy new ones when my dog chewed up mine. I've bought them as gifts for almost everyone in my family. They are very comfortable and easy to wear inside and out. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: MoWalk

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 9-10 periwinkle slippers and love them! I wear a size 8.5 and the slippers are a little big but I wear socks with them and they are perfect. I think if I bought the 7-8 they would have been too small and I would have been walking on the backs. They compliment beautifully my deep purple robe! Very happy with these slippers!
customer_reviews.author: soccermom

customer_reviews.title: So comfy but fit a little small
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! I love them. They fit a little smaller than i expected. I wear a 9 1/2 or a 10 and ordered a large which is a 9-10.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I first got them, they were soooo comfortable, but after wearing them just a few months, they've stretched out too big, the insides are coming apart, and can't safely wear them. I spent more money on these than I usually do slippers, (usually spend between $5-$10), and have been very disappointed in the quality for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Wyndi

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8.5 and went with the 9-10, they are perfect. I always size up on slippers because they tend to run small. I love these slippers, they are warm and have a hard sole, which is great if you need to run outside for something. The pattern is very cute as well. I would recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: als84

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: At first they seem to be great. Almost a little snug which was fine with me but after a short. I’ll support everything about the shoe/slipper just started going to hell in a handbasket. Would not purchase these again ever, and I do not recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Sara McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers as a gift for my mom because her old pair was falling apart. She loves these slippers so much! I got them in the 11/12 because I heard they ran a bit small, and those fit her really well with a little wiggle room. All in all, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Quest

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandma as a christmas gift. She personally said she loved them and that they were her most comfortable house slippers. She looks for the maximum comfort she can find in shoes so I know she loves these and found them very comfortable because it's 9 months later and she is still wearing these over any other shoes the family have bought her throughout the year. They are good quality and throughout the year have shown no signs of wear and tear. I'm very impressed with these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm and very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this product is warm and very pretty. What I didn't like, but I also wasn't expecting to get, was arch support. I can buy slippers with more support if I want to, and I might, but these were very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Diana John Jamerson

product_meta.title: RockDove Women's Fair Isle Sweater Knit Memory Foam Slipper
feature_bullets: As cozy as your favorite sweater, they'll keep your feet comfy and warm
Indoor outdoor nonslip sole lets you walk anywhere from bedroom to briefly outside the house; perfect for fetching the morning paper or mail
High density memory foam footbed cushions your every step like pillows under your feet; supported by extra layers of support foam and shock-reducing EVA
Minor arch support helps relieve common foot pains (e.g. plantar fasciitis) from standing or walking all day; compressible foam eases swollen pains from edema or diabetic feet

Hand knitted upper repels dust and hair; machine washable in case they get stained or dirty; convert to girls sizing by subtracting 2 from our women's sizes; for example, the women's 5-6 is equivalent to a girls size 3-4
